Reviews.Title: nice but battery lasts short
Reviews.Author: Tungaa
Reviews.Content: very powerful, fast computer with Windows 8 lot possibilities for socializing and entertainment. However, I did not notice in specifications before purchasing it that there was no DVD/CD drive. Also I discovered that battery does not last long. Otherwise a nice machine.

Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: Sheila
Reviews.Content: Just after a few weeks of buying this as a gift for my husband, it started giving problems already. The finger print feature wasn't working, the computer froze up, a bunch of issues happened to it. I was very disappointed in the product. And that purchase is still hurting me to this day. Just ridiculous.

Reviews.Title: Basic software not included & technical problems
Reviews.Author: Douglas
Reviews.Content: I've never heard of a Windows based computer that doesn't come with Word and the other basic MS software but this doesn't and they want another $300 to buy it, so I was pretty outraged.  The computer itself is very good and fast and I really like the fingerprint swipe in lieu of entering passwords.  The only things I don't like are: (i) I absolutely loathe Windows 8 so far, (ii) the battery length is not as long as advertised and (iii) the a/c adapter cord where it connects to the side of the computer refuses to stay put and falls out a lot.Updated: I've dropped this from 3 to 2 stars b/c the battery life after 5 months is pretty pathetic.  I fully charged it today and then unplugged and my battery estimate was just over an hour.  Also, this week, the fingerprint scanner just died out of the blue.  Still under warranty so presumably I'll get the latter (though so far the warranty process is less than straightforward).  In any event this isn't what I expected from HP.

Reviews.Title: NOT 40% OFF
Reviews.Author: scott hurlbert
Reviews.Content: Not exactly a 40% off deal. $891 X 40% = $534.60 NOT $609!!Would not believe the advertised savings. Truthful advertising is appreciated.
